item.title: Frank Gardner: 'It happened again' - Why are wheelchair-users left on planes?
item.description:
Ben Furner experienced the same thing just weeks earlier at a different British airport. He was left on a plane while someone went in search of his mobility scooter.

Source: BBC News

item.title: Tesco refuse access to disabled man with guide dog, twice in a week
item.description:
In the United Kingdom, Sean Dilly, a correspondent for the BBC, details his experiences with access to Tesco with his guide dog.

Source: BBC News

item.title: Heathrow Airport leave disabled passenger on aircraft without assistance
item.description:
In the United Kingdom, Frank Gardner, a security correspondent for the BBC was left on an aircraft without assistance.

Source: Twitter
